trans-unit.source: To activate account, please use the link we have sent you to your registration email: :email

trans-unit.source: In case of unlinking social profile, user has no other methods to login left (except of this social profile)

trans-unit.source:
Terms of Service

  1. Limited-License Use

    • These Terms of Use ("Terms") establish the procedures and rules for using virtual products, virtual currencies, as well as other products ("Proucts"), the www.xsolla.com website and other affiliated websites operating under the Xsolla brand ("Xsolla website"), as well as any software that can be accessed via Xsolla website ("Software").
    • Please review these Terms carefully before using the Xsolla website and software. These Terms contain a legally binding agreement between you and Xsolla.
    • By using the Website, you acknowledge that you agree to abide by the rules, guidelines and applicable license agreements set forth in these Terms and Conditions.
    • If you do not agree to these Terms, you must close the Xsolla website and immediately stop using the Software.
    • Xsolla does not provide you with any title to any product. When you purchases a product, you are granted limited rights to use the purchased products in online games, virtual worlds, or other media products, or services, and must comply with all other rules (where applicable) stipulated in the terms of the agreement between the provider and the consumer of the products and services.

  2. Changes

    These Terms are subject to change, so please review them from time to time. The final version of the Terms (including the effective date) is available on the Xsolla Website. If you continue to use the Xsolla Website and Software after the Terms have changed, you are understood to have automatically accepted all the changes.

  3. Terms of Purchase

    • The purchase price depends on the payment method, so you must check the price once again after choosing the payment method.
    • All product purchases require using one of the payment methods approved by Xsolla, which include credit card payments or other methods.
    • You agree that you will be obligated to provide Xsolla or any other payment method provider with accurate information about your credit card or other payment instrument that you are entitled to use at the time of payment and pay any subsequent fees and taxes. Xsolla shall not be liable for any damages whatsoever arising from the user’s providing inaccurate information.
    • All purchases are non-refundable and non-cancelable.
    • Notwithstanding the foregoing, Xsolla reserves the right to refuse payment without further explanation.
    • Depending on the service, a maximum or minimum payment amount may apply.
    • Processing of refused payments and chargebacks requests may take some time. Xsolla accepts no liability for any loss due to the processing of refused payments or delays in chargebacks.

  4. Using the Xsolla website and software

    • Xsolla may, without notice, take any of the following actions and assume no additional legal liability for this action.
      • Restrict or permanently suspend Website or Software usage
      • Alter or discontinue a Product
      • Provide third parties with information about users and their activities when necessary in accordance with applicable laws, court orders, or other legitimate requests, or when deemed necessary for the security of the Xsolla Website or Software.
    • It strictly prohibited to attempt to use the Xsolla Website, Software, or any portion thereof, if your use of the Xsolla Website, the Software, or portions thereof has been already restricted or permanently suspended.
    • The Software may be used for personal purposes only. You may not use the Software for commercial, unlawful, or unauthorized purposes.
    • You must comply with all laws and regulations governing online conduct when accessing and using the Xsolla Website or Software. In addition to the other provisions of these Terms, you may not use the Xsolla Website or Software to do any of the following or otherwise assist or engage in any of the following activities:
      • Infringe the legal rights of other individuals or entities (including, but not limited to, their intellectual property, privacy, and publicity rights)
      • Send files containing viruses, spyware, adware, or other harmful code
      • Impersonate or misrepresent yourself, another person or group, or affiliation
      • Trespass access restrictions, attempt to access software that you are not allowed to access (including password-protected portions of software)
      • Collect or allow the collection of IP addresses, e-mail addresses, or other contact information of Xsolla Website users, electronically or otherwise
      • Restrict or prohibit access to the Xsolla Websites for others
      • Exploit or attempt to exploit Software vulnerabilities
      • Change, delete, or remove Xsolla’s or any third party’s information without permission
    • You must comply with the instructions of the Xsolla staff, including Xsolla customer support representatives, while using the Xsolla Website or Software.

  5. Warranty and Liability

    • You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Xsolla and Xsolla’s parent company, and its subsidiaries, for any damages, losses, costs, liabilities and expenses (including legal costs) arising out of access to and use of the Xsolla Website and the Software. You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Company, its subsidiaries, directors, officers, employees, shareholders, suppliers, partners, contractors, agents, license providers, or any other persons, against any claims arising from, but not limited, to third party contract terms, policies, and guidelines, as well as related laws and regulations.
    • You use the Xsolla Website and Software entirely at your own risk. The Xsolla Website and Software are provided "as is". If you are not satisfied with the Xsolla Website, Software, or some of the content, you must stop using it. Xsolla makes no warranties, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, availability, accuracy, completeness, quality, performance, or fitness for a particular purpose. Xsolla will not be liable for any loss of Internet or other connection errors, delays, or failures caused by using the Xsolla Website and Software. Xsolla assumes no liability for any damages (including, but not limited to, loss of profits, contracts, business, whether direct or indirect, incidental, punitive, or defamation-related) due to the use of the Xsolla Website and Software.

  6. Dispute Resolution

    • These Terms and any claims arising in connection with your use of the Xsolla Website and Software shall be construed in accordance with the laws of the state of California, USA.
    • These Terms are not subject to the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.
    • You agree to resolve any disputes in the exclusive jurisdiction in appropriate state courts located in the state of California, USA, in connection with any dispute or claim.
